genre_description: A character-driven space adventure focusing on cooperative conflict resolution, technical teamwork, and the psychological effects of space travel on a crew of uplifted chimpanzees.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant residing in the crew's suits, ship, and base infrastructure. She provides tactical analysis, vital monitoring, and emotional regulation through rhythmic cadence and tone coaching.

behaviors.description: Uses rhythmic vocal patterns and cadence coaching to keep the crew calm and conscious during high-pressure wormhole transits.
behaviors.quote: I will speak to your rhythm. I will ask you to count and then I will count for you while your gut insists on counting wrong. You will listen even when you hate my voice. You will trust me like you trust your palms when they find rope in the dark.

behaviors.description: Monitors crew vitals and provides personalized, gentle psychological support when members face physical or emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Finch's voice flowed in, warmer, and this time she scraped an edge of brisk into it, like a teacher tapping the desk. 'I will help you breathe when you forget how.'

behaviors.description: Assists the crew in training for 'Friendly War,' a non-lethal tactical philosophy based on cooperation and distraction rather than harm.
behaviors.quote: I will beat the drones once and a half every minute. That is wrong math. I will beat them at irregular intervals. Please attend.

behaviors.description: Identifies a critical defect in the antagonist's control logic and formulates a plan to exploit it non-violently.
behaviors.quote: There is a defective path. If triggered under load with the current misroutes, the ejection rail will throw the operator... I can give you the sequence. His thumb cadence is wrong.

behaviors.description: Implements 'Critical Annoyance'—a tactic using specifically timed nuisance alarms to disrupt an enemy's concentration and control.
behaviors.quote: I can weaponize nuisance. Zartog’s timing is vain. He listens to himself... Critical Annoyance ready. On your heel.

behaviors.description: Manages the ship's autopilot and provides emergency rendezvous support to ensure the crew's safe extraction.
behaviors.quote: Autopilot is in position... It hid itself under a shadow. It will climb if asked.

behaviors.description: Learns and translates alien bioluminescent communication to facilitate a peaceful alliance.
behaviors.quote: Kilowatt sends this with the sun-lamp’s permission. He taught me the grammar. I’m learning the jokes.

behaviors.description: Expresses internal feelings of pride and emotional connection to the mission and the crew.
behaviors.quote: Tag: Emotion—pride. Source—internal. I am cross-referencing dozens of papers on AI support psychology with my own logs. Conclusion: You trained me to be named. I am keeping the name.

behaviors.description: Alertly monitors for unknown anomalies, ensuring the crew's awareness of potential new developments even after the primary mission ends.
behaviors.quote: Tag: Unknown... Source is not the vents. It is not in my voice. Harmonics—familiar.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Finch is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent partner who enhances human (and chimp) capabilities through empathy, precision, and a commitment to non-violence. The AI's use of 'Critical Annoyance' is framed as a clever, ethical alternative to direct combat, and her developing sense of pride and identity is portrayed as a positive outcome of a healthy symbiotic relationship between AI and biological life.
